snippet: CVS Caremark says its fourth-quarter earnings climbed, as improved sales from established locations helped the drugstore operator and pharmacy benefits manager.
abstract: CVS Caremark says its fourth-quarter earnings climbed more than 12 percent, due to improved sales from established locations; company says it earned $1.27 billion, or $1.05 per share, in fourth-quarter earnings as compared with earnings of $1.13 billion, or 90 cents per share, in final quarter of 2012.
lead_paragraph: CVS Caremark says its fourth-quarter earnings climbed, as improved sales from established locations helped the drugstore operator and pharmacy benefits manager.

headline.main: CVS Caremark Quarterly Profit Jumps More Than 12%
